results.title: Protective effects of metformin against aluminum phosphide-induced acute hepato-renal damage in rats: An experimental approach.
results.text_hl: This study determined the ameliorative effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@) on @CHEMICAL_aluminum_phosphide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C001864 @@@AlP@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hepatopulmonary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020065 @@@hepato- and nephro-toxicity@@@ in Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Khezri MR, Varzandeh R, Ghasemnejad-Berenji M. Protective effects of metformin against aluminum phosphide-induced acute hepato-renal damage in rats: An experimental approach. Pestic Biochem Physiol. 2022 Nov;188():105258. PMID: 36464363

results.title: Dual organ beneficial effects of metformin in cirrhotic rats with hepatopulmonary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Dual organ beneficial effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Idiopathic_Noncirrhotic_Portal_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000094724 @@@cirrhotic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hepatopulmonary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020065 @@@hepatopulmonary syndrome@@@.
